page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: In our area we have fairly mixed housing but predominately owned.Council houses are very rare in our area.A house on the A6 dates back to 1898.Mostly private houses in this area range from 400 years old.Houses of long ago had bigger gardens than the houses of today with the smaller gardens.Houses of today have double glazing as old houses used to have shutters and lead windows.Thatched houses with beams and wooden walls are very few nowadays.Big houses were quite rare in the seventeenth century.One woman actually lived in a barn before living in Hathern.
